'''Richard Darnville''' was a boy who got into a fight (not really a fight) with [[Paul Stevens]] in 5th grade. He bit Paul on the nose and Paul fell down. Richard's bite or Paul's fall left a scar on Paul's nose which he still had in adulthood.

In "[[The One With The Ring]]", Paul told his girlfriend at the time [[Rachel Greene]] about this encounter while he was telling her about his miserable childhood and continuously crying.
All this crying caused Rachel to break up with Paul.
